name: Globlazer Cat Tower for Indoor Cats, Heavy Duty Cat Trees for Large Cats Adult Big Cats Maine Coon Cat Tree Tower with Scratching Post, Extra Large Top Perch, Cat Condos, F61, Light Grey, 61inch
short_description: COMPREHENSIVE DESIGN - The 61-inch cat tree is crafted to cater to the diverse needs of large adult cats. With multiple levels and features, offers a vertical space for climbing, lounging platforms for relaxation, and interactive toys.

EXTRA-LARGE TOP PERCH - This large cat tower with a large size 17.7"x 15.7" top perch serves as a versatile platform that is suitable for big fat cats or multiple kittens. Providing a prime spot for relaxation and observation.

SPACIOUS CAT CONDOS - The two generously sized cat condos for indoor large cats measuring 17.7"x 15.7"x 13.8" each provide cozy retreats. Isn't one enough? There are two on this cat tree. Ideal for adult cats to seek a quiet spot to rest or observe their surroundings.

CAT TOWER WITH SCRATCHING POST - The inclusion of seven natural sisal scratching posts not only promotes healthy scratching behavior but also helps maintain your cat's claws and protect your furniture.
ENTERTAINMENT TOYS INCLUDED - In addition to the base functional aspects of the cat tree, the hanging mouse toys and dangling balls, enrich their daily routine.

name: Globlazer Cat Tower for Multiple Indoor Cats, 52 inch Heavy Duty Cat Tree with 3 Condos, Plush Cat Condo with Scratch Posts and Pad for Adult Cats Kitten, Padded Perch, Basket Bed, F52B, Light Grey
short_description: 3 Cozy Cat Condos: The 52inch cat tree for Indoor cats features three spacious cat condos arranged at different levels, each serving as a private hideaway for your feline friends. These cat caves to cats of all ages and temperaments, providing them with a quiet space for rest

Cat Scratching Posts and Board: Equipped with four posts wrapped in natural sisal, the cat condo tower protects your furniture from sharp claws. The expansive sisal cat scratching board not only extends the scratching fun but also cleverly doubles as a ladder, aiding kittens and older cats climb

Large Basket Bed and Entertaining Toys: A sturdy metal frame combined with soft fabric creates a perfect and stable lounging basket bed for cat naps. Plush balls and a spring mouse toy are always ready to spark their hunting instincts, offering endless entertainment

Sturdy and Enlarged Base: The base (25.5 x 15.7 inches) of the sturdy cat climbing tower is enlarged to enhance overall stability. The included anti-tip straps can be fixed to the wall to ensure stability even when multiple cats are playing at the same time

Effortless and Quick Assembly: Assembling the F52B cat furniture activity center is straightforward and quick, with all components clearly labeled and essential tools provided. A detailed instruction manual with pictures ensures a hassle-free setup without needing extra help

name: HOOBRO Cat Tree with Litter Box Enclosure, 68.9" H Cat Tower with Food Bowl and Storage, Hidden Litter Enclosure Furniture, All-in-One Modern Cat Condo, with House, Hammock and Perch, Greige BG80MZ03
short_description: Feline Fortress: The cat tree features a hidden cat litter house, offering a private space for cats to do their business in peace. The side aisle effectively reduces odors and litter tracking, ensuring easy cleaning and a consistently fresh home ambiance

Cat's Dining Nook: The cat tower boasts a food bowl on the right side, creating a designated dining spot. The open platform can house a water bowl for cats to drink after eating. The storage cabinet beneath the platform cleverly stores cat snacks and toys

Instinct Release: The teaser sticks and hanging balls ignite cats' hunting play, offering interactive fun and honing their agility with each leaps and pounces. The sisal posts fulfill their natural urge to scratch and sharpen claws, spicing up daily life

Vitality Playground: The multi-tiered cat tree provides ideal spots for cats to jump, play and release energy. The cat house with mat, soft hammock, and high perch are located on different levels, allowing cats to choose their way to rest after exercise

Easy Assembly: All parts are numbered and include all necessary tools. With clear and detailed illustrated instructions, you can easily create a special paradise for your cat. The handles on both sides enable easy movement and flexible positioning

Multi-Level Cat Playground: Designed with multiple levels, this cat tower makes it easy for cats to climb and explore the vertical space, satisfying their natural instincts and activity needs
Easy to Assemble: Thanks to the universal screws and simple structure, it takes only the included Allen hex key and one person to set up this cat condo
2 Pompoms, Double the Fun: 2 hanging pompoms with bells encourage your little hunters to stretch, bat, and swat for endless entertainment
Sturdy and Secure: Supported by a strong structure and secured with an anti-tip kit, this cat tree is strong and safe for up to 5 cats (max. 11 lb each) to climb and play with peace of mind

name: HOOBRO Cat Tree with Litter Box Enclosure, 27.6" L x 18.9" W x 52" H, All-in-One Wooden Cat Tower, Cat Furniture for Indoor Cats, Cat Condo with Hammock, Detachable Teaser Sticks, Greige BG14MZ03
short_description: All-in-One Cat Condo: This all-in-one cat tree with litter box enclosure combines cat play, rest, relaxation and other needs, including cat house, cat hammock, observation decks, sisal posts, funny cat sticks and cat litter enclosure. It makes all functions available, creating a multi-level dream cat tower that lets cats fall in love and be fascinated in a second

Hidden Cat Litter Box: The cat tree's bottom is a cat litter house with louver-type breathable double doors, which gives the cat more privacy and makes the room more tidy. The spacious interior (24.8"L x 18.5"W x 15"H) can put the litter box to make a cat toilet or be used to store cat supplies. Its versatility will surprise you

Multiple Resting Places: Your cat feels tired after climbing up and down? Troubled by the several cats? Don't worry, this cat tree is designed with multiple resting spaces-spacious observation decks with soft plush cushions and a cute cat hammock. Moreover, an additional square cat house with two cat holes (diameter 7.1") is added for cats' leisure and rest

Fits Cats' Nature: Our designers fully consider the characteristics of the born hunters who like climbing and choose durable sisal posts of different heights to form uneven cat towers for cats to exercise and sharpen their claws. The soft plush balls and the removable sticks help cats release the nature and enhance the interaction between you and your lovely partner

Quality Materials for Reliable Use: Our cat tree is made of premium particleboard and each part is connected firmly for sturdy construction. 4 adjustable feet at the bottom are the bonus for the integral stability while maintaining friendliness to your floors. Just rest assured and let your lively friend enjoy climbing and jumping with this cat villa

Natural Sisal Posts: Equipped with 7 natural sisal-covered scratching posts, these posts are perfect for your indoor cat's natural scratching needs while protecting your furniture from damage. The sisal posts are sturdy and durable, and help keep your cat's paws healthy by matching their movement habits, climbing and exploring freely

Hammock & Basket: This space-saving corner cat tree is designed with your cat's comfort and preferences in mind, featuring a plush hammock and a cozy hanging basket. that swings slightly to provide diverse resting options. These elements mimic the way cats rest in their natural environment and are made of high-quality materials to ensure long-term comfort

Easy To Install: This corner cat furniture is designed to be simple and easy to assemble, with all the necessary tools and clear instructions included, making it easy for even novice DIYers to complete.
